bibl.title: A New Fragment on Ptolemaic History. (Summary.)
Proceedings of the XIV International Congress of Papyrologists
bibl.author: Renner, Timothy T.

bibl.note: Prose literary narrative dealing with military operations. First century B.C. (or perhaps early first A.D.).
Renner Timothy T., A New Fragment on Ptolemaic History. (Summary.)
Proceedings of the XIV International Congress of Papyrologists (London, 1975) p. 176.
